name: anima-project
description: A React project automatically generated by Anima, the design-to-code platform

scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=sofvo
scripts.deploy:token: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --auth-method=api-token
scripts.deploy:api: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../deploy.zip . && cd .. && curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/735a033d7ce04688a79295271742517b/pages/projects/sofvo/deployments" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN}" -F "file=@deploy.zip" && rm deploy.zip
